summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2831, for the improvement of Shoreland Drive, from Lake Park Drive to a connection with the existing pavement at Mount Claire Drive, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with suitable material, the construction of concrete curbs with armored concrete corners, and including as a part of said work the construction or reconstruction of all sewers, side sewers and watermains and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage and water service of said district.
